# File test/benchmarks/test_pos_speed.rb, line 19
  def test_pos_speed
    file = File.open(path, "r")
    length = file.stat.size
    positions = Array.new(1000) do
      p = rand(length)
    end
    
    benchmark_test(20) do |x|
      x.report("100kx pos=") do
        (1000).times do
          positions.each do |p|
            file.pos = p
            file.pos = p
          end
        end
      end
      
      x.report("100kx pos= with check") do
        (1000).times do
          positions.each do |p|
            file.pos = p
            file.pos = p unless file.pos = p
          end
        end
      end
    end   
  end
